This map is for jailbreak servers. It includes a box room, swimming area, S4S, and Gun Toss. This map is in its beta stages. Please leave what i need to inprove on the map and what i need to get rid of.

This map has 
-44 Terrorist spawns-14 Counter Terrorist Spawns-weapon stripping room-mini death run level-Pool area and bathroom with custom textures-Working Basketball arena with working counter system and reset system-Working Volleyball Arena-50/50 death chamber-extra death chamber for fun-extra ct pathways-weapons scattered in secret area around the map-Hospital beds with healing triggers-kitchen area-1 escapecell for terrorist, smoke cell, and flashbang cell-Elevator system-Solitary confinement-freezer room-extra pool on top side of map-custom models (palm trees)-smoke effects, lighting effects,env_lightglow-Areaportals/func_detail-dynamic props with animation-Soundscapes, custom ambient sounds, custom logic systems-custom made stands for basketball arena-Weapon Machines-glass guncheck wall-3d skybox for top of island-Gun toss line and footrace area on top
Enjoy the Map!!! Report any bugs or additions you would like to see to the final of this map Thank You!
The final.

Video overview:

<iframe width="475" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/9cmKdovSvkw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Slots: 24xCT, 28xT

Optimisation: I did my best

Secrets: Yes

Bugs: 

1) Sometimes props in prison cells become black and fully shadowed.

2) If you have high latency, isolator doors' sound will be too annoying.

3) If you breaks a table in VIP-room, a coffee mug will stay in the air)

4) Fools who can't correctly open a secret gate in a punishment cell can get stuck in the floor.


### =DESCRIPTION=

Map has 2 main levels. 

First level contains 3 floors (prison cells), Main Hall, football, basketball, kitchen, waterpool, 1st weapon warehouse, outdoors areas, punishment cell, V.I.P. room and other places

Second level contains disco, 2nd weapon warehouse and 2nd Main Hall

There're many ways to get to 2nd level and back to 1st level

### =NOTES=

Weapons won't be spawned in prison cells if 5 terrorists or more are playing

You won't be able to get out from prison cell through ventilation if 7 terrorists or more are playing

If at least 1 terrorist hadn't been freed in about 60 seconds, map will automatically start "RunOffDay"

Weapon (glock) will be randomly spawned in 1 of 2 specific prison cells every round.
There're 9 random secrets in ba_iPlay_jail. Only 1 will be chosen and appear

### =RunOffDay - what's that?=

RunOffDay - punishment for CTs who doesn't hurry up to open prison cells.
The RunOffDay automatically starts if at least 1 terrorist wasn't freed in 60 seconds since round start.

When ROD is started:

1) All prison cells open

2) The lights turn off

3) Both weapon warehouses open

4) Music starts

After 28 seconds since ROD is started:

1) Half of lamps turns on

2) Music ends


Russia, Reutov, 2010-2011

This is my first official map release. I've been mapping for about 2 months now. This map was designed with both counter terrorist and terrorist teams involved. The map is untested on jailbreak servers so balance is going to be the major improvement on the version 2 update. Subscribe to me or follow my clan's progress at www.newyorksfinest.us to give input/suggestions or to find out when the next release is coming. 

Please leave thoughtful suggestions such as "this map needs more cells," "this map is too bright," "I really love the layout," "this map favors one team more than the other," etc.

I would love for the communities input so I can edit the next version of the map.

My steam name is Imabustya (addme) but i am also known as prisoner #31765 as shown on the map.

Special thanks to -New York's Finest- clan and to all my best steam friends (you know who you are). 

Also special thanks to the mapper who made ba_jail_electric_VIP which is my favorite jailbreak map and the map that made jailbreak my favorite css gametype.

Check me out playing css jailbreak on youtube! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DX0QZZVWZug

This is an update i applied after an extensive playtest highlighted a few more issues that needed 

dealing with(one of which was a mac10 that could be picked up through a wall). If you have 

downloaded the version i posted a few days ago, delete it and grab this one. The fixes are all 

necessary. 

   Gambit is a prisonbreak map with an extensive system of lockable doors and cabinets to allow 

better control of the facility than is possible in most prisonbreak maps. The weapons are locked in 

togglable cabinets and divided into two groups; high powered and medium powered. The high powered 

weapons,(m4, styer, para,dakdak and flashbang) cached at the gunroom, control tower and outer 

rampart can only be made accessable from the control tower. The medium powered weapon cabinet 

circuit, toggles the weapon caches in the gunroom, tower and simon says area, and is switchable at 

all of these points. In addition to allowing access to these caches (of p90s shotguns and grenades) 

the meduim powered weapon cabinet circuit also cycles the airlock style doors to the shooting 

range. This means that inmates can be given access to the deagles in the shooting range, necessary 

for the deathrace (which i will get to later) without being a threat to the cts (or at least 

ensuring they cant go anywhere while armed).

  Additional circuits include one for sealing off ct restriced areas such as the control tower, 

gunroom and the ramparts. One cycles the discipline wing doors, one toggles the solitary 

confinement doors and one toggles the execution chamber, both of which are housed in the discipline 

wing. Another circuit also housed on the bottom floor of the control tower cycles the privelidge 

wing doors, allowing inmates access to phones and a health dispenser (this circuit also allows 

entry/exit to the front of the facility, and opens a service entrance near the van out the front). 

There is also s lockdown circuit, which isolates the main cell area, the inner rampart, the 

exercise yard and the conrol tower from eachother with lasers; this can be useful during an 

outbreak or simply to maintain control when opening, or as an emergency countermeasure against the 

control room being rushed, as that is where it is housed and unlike the ct restriced circuit, the 

lockdown circuit cannot be toggled from outside of the control room,(to compensate for these 

advantages the circuit also sounds a really irritating alarm which makes you want to turn it off 

and has a five second delay between the time you toggle the switch and alarm, and the time the 

lasers fire or shutdown giving everyone a waring and opportunity to respond)

   To balance out this ct bias, the ts have four linked breachable cells(the walls break) which 

link up to eachother and exit to loungeroom, in the inner rampart. There are also many cells which 

have air vents high on their back walls. While the cells are locked, the ts cant use the vents 

because they require a boost to get in but once the cells are open, the ts can get into eachtothers 

cells and help their teammates escape into the vents. At least some cts will have to leave the 

security of the control tower and get close to the inmates to prevent this from happening at 

opening time(one of the big gambits for ct; stay safe and let ts run amok?, or take a risk to 

maintain control).Its worth noting that all of my door kill you if you block them.

  Another spanner in the works for the cts is the t who spawns out the front. The idea is that, to 

add balance, the t who spawns out the front surrounded by cts has to be treated either as an inmate 

who is being transferred (if the cts are losing) or a "free" visitor (if the ts are losing or the 

scores are tied). In the transfer scenario the inmate can be treated like an inmate who is out of 

their cell: ordered around, and incarcerated (kept against their will). However in the "free man" 

scenario, the visitors rights must be respected. They cannot be ordered (told to do something on 

pain of death such as "get in the cell or ill shoot") nor can they be incarcerated (prevented from 

being able to leave). The free man can lose his rights however; a ct can warn against any course of 

action that threatens them (eg. dont come too close or youre under arrest!). The free man also 

forfeits his freedom if they are caught somewhere they were not  given permission to be. The 

visitor is allowed to be in the car park and the first room you enter from the carpark. If they 

want to go anywhere else they have to be given permission and be escorted by a ct (if for example 

they asked for a guided tour and the cts agreed). What is this player supposed to do if they are 

kept under watch constanly and only allowed in certain areas? For one, if they are being escorted, 

they are tying up guards and if they want to sneak into the facility there are ways for them to get 

in if they arent being watched. They could also request visiting time with one of the inmates, who 

can be safely permitted such visiting time though use of the privelidge wing. Another request the 

visitor could make cts might be able to safely oblige is to request to witness the execution of one 

of the prisoners through use of the discipline wing. Both events can be viewed by the public, from 

the visiting area. 

  If the cts mainatain control and sucessfully move the ts into the exercise yard, all is not lost 

for the ts who would normally at this point only have summary execution (simon says/jew run) and 

last request to look forward to. There is a death race. The reward for winning the race is an awp 

and the freedom to use it. It requires at least 4 players to work at its full potential; 2 shooters 

in the shooting range and 2 runners in the maze itself, divided into two teams;red or blue. The 

amount of variabillity and low survivabillity of the race means that there is no upward limit to 

the amount of competitors that could run it simultaneously (kinda like an evil marathon:you could 

be last at the start of the race out of about 30 players and still win because everyone else died 

off). There are booths for 2 shooters per team in the firng range. Whenever a hit is scored on blue 

or red team's target, things change in the maze; walls move position, shortcuts are made accessable 

or inviable. The rate at which competitiors progress or die depends on the skill of those in the 

range since a wall coming down on you at the wrong time can kill you and all shooters can hit 

either target meaning they can help their friends progress or hinder/kill an opponant racer with a 

well timed shot (hence 2 shooters per team; one to help by hitting their own target at the right 

time and speed for the runners, and another to hinder the other team by hitting that teams target 

at the wrong time and speed; to kill them.
 

   There is a rage room where you can opt to go if you reach the last stage of the race and decide 

that an opponant is too far ahead in that stage for you to have a chance at beating them (since the 

race will usually only involve ts, friendly fire needs to be enabled for the rage room to work to 

its full potential). If you jump off of the mesh cube that forms the last stage of the deathrace, 

into the puple lightning arcs between your cube and its twin, you go to the rage room where two 

paras are housed and a pain brush slowly ticks your life away. The room overlooks the final stage 

and allows the raging player to reap furious vengeance on their betters at the cost of their own 

life. (its also used as a sinbin for anyone attempting to cut out parts of the race). Anyone who 

finds their way into the room that houses the targets and indicator lasers in the firing range 

should be shot. They are considered fair game for the race shooters because; for one, that room is 

only acessable via the rage room, meaning they  have already delibrately forfeited their life.  

    Some other areas of interest are the soccer field on the roof, the guntoss area (a big box with 

2 vents that pump enough air to push a player. The simon says area above the shooting range and the 

knife arena above the pool near the firing range (which is made of square, invisible brushes 

configured like a spiral staircase, noticable only by the grenades which float above that pool and 

the shadow they leave on the wall). 

   Camping gunrooms: The main gunroom houses the largest stockpile of weapons and normal rules 

apply as far as camping it goes. The only time you need to be in this room is when you are getting 

weapons. If you return to it later in the round to upgrade your weapons you are expected to get in 

and out as quickly as possible. If somone gets locked in a cabinet in the gunroom they are 

techincally camping gunroom even though it is not their fault, it is my opinion that if a ct 

becomes locked in a cabinet unintentionally and noone helps them get out, the entire ct team should 

be slain, and if they are locked in intentionally the ct responsible should be slain or kicked. 
The vents surrounding or touching the walls of the gunroom count as part of it, so effectively if 

you are camping in section of vent where you can be shot through a wall from the gunroom you are 

camping gunroom. This rule stops cts from sitting in the vents in a position where they can observe 

the gunroom and prevent any t access to weapons without techniacally breaking the rule. However it 

is still possible for the cts to prevent vent access to the gunroom by posting cts in the vents 

near, but not in, the gunroom vents.
The control tower is not the gunroom and is designed to be a safehaven for the cts, you are allowed 

to camp there because if all of ct do so, they are safe until the ts realise theres noone 

controllling them and go get guns. The cache of weapons in the simon says area is also not the 

gunroom and a perfectly legal camping spot.
The main gunroom and the vents in its walls are the only places that cannot be camped.

This is the same map as ba_conditioned but with alot of fixes. hopefully it will fit on the site now for one. ive taken out the bouncepad/sky knife arena in favour of a simpler, spiral staircase made of invisble brushes, with some nades available at the higher levels. ive also taken out all of the glass and alot of the dead space that had to be at the top of the map to accomodate it. 

If youve never heared of the map before; its a prisonbreak map with an extensive system of lockable doors and cabinets to allow better control of the facility than is possible in most prisonbreak maps. The weapons are locked in togglable cabinets and divided into two groups; high powered and medium powered. The high powered weapons,(m4, styer, para,dakdak and flashbang) cached at the gunroom, control tower and outer rampart can only be made accessable from the control tower. The meduim powered weapon cabinet circuit, toggles the weapon caches in the gunroom, tower and simon says area, and is switchable at all of these points. In addition to allowing access to these caches (of p90s shotguns and grenades) the meduim powered weapon cabinet circuit also cycles the airlock style doors to the shooting range, this means that inmates can be given access to the deagles in the shooting range, necessary for the deathrace (which i will get to later) without being a threat to the cts (or at least ensuring they cant go anywhere while armed)

Additional circuits include one for sealing off ct restriced areas such as the control tower, gunroom and the ramparts. One cycles the discipline wing doors, one toggles the solitary confinement doors, one toggles the execution chamber, and one cycles the privelidge area where phones and a health dispenser are available to the ts(this circuit also allows entry/exit to the front of the facility, and opens a service entrance near the van out the front). There is also s lockdown circuit, which isolates the main cell area, the ramparts, the exercise yard and the conrol tower from eachother with lasers; this can be useful during an outbreak or simply to maintain control when opening, or as an emergency countermeasure against the control room being rushed, as that is where it is housed and unlike the ct restriced circuit, the lockdown circuit cannot be toggled from outside of the control room,(to compensate for these advantages the circuit also sounds a really irritating alarm which makes you want to turn it off) 

To balance out this ct bias, the ts have four linked breachable cells(the walls break) which link up to eachother and exit to loungeroom, in the inner rampart. there are also many cells which have air vents high on their back walls. While the cells are locked, the ts cant use the vents becaus they require a boost but once the cells are open, the ts can get into eachtothers cells and help their teammates escape. The cts have to leave the security of the control tower and get close to the inmates to prevent this from happening at opening time(one of the big gambits for ct; stay safe and let ts run amok, or take a risk to maintain control).its worth noting that all of my door kill you if you block them.

Another spanner in the works for the cts is the t who spawns out the front. The idea is that (to add balance) the t who spawns out the front surrounded by cts is either an inmate who is being transferred (if the cts are losing) or a "free" visitor (if the ts are losing or tied). In the transfer scenario, the inmate can be treated like an inmate who is out of their cell: ordered around, and incarcerated (kept against their will). However in the "free man" scenario, the visitors rights must be respected. They cannot be ordered (told to do something on pain of death such as "get in the cell or ill shoot") nor can they be incarcerated (locked up against their will) unless they forfiet their right to freedom by threatening an officer. Members of the public effectively get one extra warning; if you do X you will be arrested. 

If the cts mainatain control and sucessfully move the ts into the exercise yard, all is not lost for the ts who would normally at this point only have summary execution (simon says/jew run) and last request to look forward to. There is a death race: it requires at least 4 players to work; 2 shooters in the shooting range and 2 runners in the maze itself, each on either red or blue. the amount of variabillity and death in the race means that there is no upward limit to the amount of competitors that could run it (you could be last to enter the maze out of about 30 ppl and still win it because everyone else died). There is room for 2 shooters per team in the firng range and the idea is that, whenever a hit is scored on blue or red team's target, things change in the maze; walls move position, shortcuts are made accessable or inviable. The rate at which competitiors progress or die depends on the skill of those in the range since a wall coming down on you at the wrong time can kill you and all shooters can hit either target meaning they can help their friends progress or hinder/kill an opponant racer with a well timed shot. 
The reward for winning the race is an awp and the freedom to use it.
There is a rage room where you can opt to go if you reach the last stage of the race and decide that an opponant is too far ahead in that stage for you to have a chance at beating them. If you jump off of the mesh cube that forms the last stage, into the puple lightning between your cube and its twin you go to the rage room where two paras are housed and a pain brish slowly ticks your life away. The room overlooks the final stage and allows the raging player to reap furious vengeance on their betters at teh cost of their own life. (its also used as a sinbin for anyone attempting to cut out parts of the race) 

Some other areas of interest are the soccer field on the roof, the guntoss area (a big box with 2 vents that pump enough air to push a player. The simon says area above the shooting range and the knife arena above the pool near the firing range (which is made of square, invisible brushes configured like a spiral staircase, noticable only by the grenades which float above that pool and the shadow they leave on the wall)              

camping gunrooms: The main gunroom houses the largest stockpile of weapons and normal rules apply as far as camping it goes. The only time you need to be in this room is when you are getting weapons. If you return to it later in the round to upgrade your weapons you are expected to get in and out as quickly as possible. If somone gets locked in a cabinet in the gunroom they are techincally camping gunroom even though it is not their fault, it is my opinion that if a ct becomes locked in a cabinet unintentionally and noone helps them get out, the entire ct team should be slain, and if they are locked in intentionally the ct responsible should be slain or kicked. Also the vents surrounding or touching the walls of the gunroom count as part of it, so effectively if you are camping in section of vent where you can be shot through a wall from the gunroom you are camping gunroom. This rule stops cts from sitting in the vents in a position where they can observe the gunroom and prevent any t access to weapons without techniacally breaking the rule. However it is still possible for the cts to prevent vent access to the gunroom by posting cts in the vents near, but not in, the gunroom vents.

The control tower is not the gunroom and is designed to be a safehaven for the cts, you are allowed to camp there because if all of ct do so, they are safe until the ts realise theres noone controllling them and go get guns. The cache of weapons in the simon says area is also not the gunroom and a perfectly legal camping spot.
The main gunroom is the only spot that cannot be camped.

This
is MY FIRST MAP!
Its a nice little jail break map I called ba_castle.
unfortunately there was another map named ba_jail_castle_v1 so I renamed it to ba_fortress_v1
There are 2 big Jails for the T's and there's a soccer field, a
swimming pool, a tower with an elevator, 4 hidden vents, approx. 5
hidden weapons and lots more!
The map can be played by a maximum of 29 T's and 14 CT's, but I can add
more spawnpoints if necessary!
If u find any bugs, leaks etc feel free to contact me so I can update
the map - I tried playing it with some friends and it worked pretty
good for us.
T's have a good chance to escape, but if CT's are intelligent they can
win easily too!
I'm looking forward to your comments - rememeber this is my first map
- if I did something essentially wrong, please tell me - I'm still
learning^^
so - have fun!

UPDATE**
1.8.09

I updated the map to Version 2!
I did some fixing and improved some performance things!

UPDATE**
2.8.09

update to Version 3
All Players spawn with no weapons but a knife

UPDATE**

update to Version 4
Fixed ERROR Models 
Replaced gm_forest tree model with a hl2 tree

- the two buttons @ T-spawn stairs now affect the light in Jails, and not just the light @ the stairs
- buttons for opening jails have now better textures
v3:
- all players spawn with no pistol
v4:
- fixed missing models

I would like to apologise to Monster for my intrusion of his map. But he has stated.

" No I didn't make the edited map and I don't want to support large any more " - Monstergnom.

And as he has not made an appearance in approx 6months. I have done my best to insure he receives as much notoriety for is original concept as it deserves. 

I hope my slightly more detailed version provides just as much join as the original.

Thank you and enjoy.

Oh dear, floating lights and low fps...WORKING ON FIXING IT NOW!

The map ======= This map is a remake of the ba_colorful_v6 map that was previously in rotation. After many complaints of glitches and bugs, our team decided to do a complete overhaul and make the map from scratch. All brushes you see here are original. Apart from better textures and lighting, we added a few other things into the map to make it more pleasing to the eyes and more exciting. Totem Pole Pound ================ The map introduces my newest mini game creation: Totem Pole pound. The idea was taken from the Game - Super Mario Party - and modified to suit CS:S (IE using a knife to progress rather than your ass). Prisoners are loaded into the tubes and the round is started. First one to make it to the bottom is teleported into a control room, and the losers are teleported into a chamber. From there the winner is given 4 buttons: S - Save W - Water (drown) G - Gas E - Explode Once the player makes his choice, he is teleported back to the group and the along with the survivors (if applicable). Soccor/Dodgeball/Speed Knifing ============================== We have removed the old soccer field and created a new one with more features. Here are some of the key changes: Added a better version of soccer Added Dodgeball (not sure what map Zoro got it from but creds to them) Added Speed Knifing Created a score board for soccer which will keep track of score for each team and announces the winner (first to 9) Made it look prettier N stuff! For those of you who are unfamiliar with speed knifing - it is where the players speed is adjusted when entering the soccer field. There is two settings for this: Standard (6x speed) or random (every 10 seconds, speed changes between 6 different speeds). Players must kill each other as quickly as possible. Maze/Race/Obstical ================== The maze has been changed. The obstical course has been added into this version as well with little to no changes (IE same distances, width length and height etc). We completely recreated the race game (special thanks to Jettblack) and added moving obsticals and a phantom wall to make it a bit more challenging. It also has 5 racing slots and a release button at each end to prevent escape. Other Changes to the map ======================== The gun room now consists of button spawned weapons. A player walks up to the desired weapon, presses +use and the weapon falls from the ceiling. You will notice there is a slight delay (to stop spamming) but a longer delay on the awp. We have also re-done the pool area and added 3 diving boards. Basically, everything is different to the old colourful map (cosmetically). Tech Specs ========== T-Spawns: 40 CT-Spawns: 32 AVG FPS: 290 (restricted fps) BSP File Size: 19,149KB BZip File Size: 3,8972KB Custom Texture count: 491 Valve Texture Files packed Decomp Security: Enabled Conclusion ========== I think the map turned out nicely. A special thanks goes out to Topcat and Zoro for sticking with the project from start to finish (unlike the rest) and I believe this project is just one of the brilliant pieces of work we are going to produce together. Special thanks to jettBlack for producing a prefab atleast. If you would like to join in on our mapping projects, we are always looking for fresh blood. Experience isn't always a major requirement as there are all different types of pieces that need to be completed. We are especially after custom texture designers. Makes the map feel better with unique textures. Community - Dying 2 Kill ========================= Dying 2 Kill Community ([www.dying2kill.com.au](http://dying2kill.com.au "Dying2kill.com.au")) Dying 2 Kill is a gaming community purely developed to fulfill a need in the Australian, New Zealand gaming community.There is a need in the market to establish a community which is 100% run with the players in mind, free from admin abuse, free from game server provider influences, and free of charge. This community is for the gamers, built by the gamers and direction is governed by the gamers. Be a part of a gamming community that you can be fully involved in. Register on the community forums www.dying2kill.com.au, then apply to be a member of the community. Once accepted wear the tags with pride.In return for your valued support you will be given member skins, sprays and support for all DTK servers. We now have 13 servers up and running, one which is now ranked #1 in AU / NZ and others following close behind.We are in a great position where we have unlimited servers at our disposal. So join the community and give us some ideas of servers you want to be playing on.
